overview:
Sanjay Kumar, Founder of Inventwheel.com, graduated from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur. After completing his degree, he worked with Contata Solutions, which provided him with a solid platform and gave a new way to look at internet business. He is a great lover of music and also plays Congo sometimes. Internet surfing is one of his passions.

“I wanted to develop my career as a developer. I learned a lot during my first two years at Contata Solutions. Then I thought to apply my whole programming skills on one unique website where I can express myself and which is also helpful to others. I thought for hours and hours and then I realized there were more than 10 ideas with me which were not yet made. How could I work on those 10 ideas, simultaneously? So I just started with Inventwheel.com. It sounds very promising and powerful than all other ideas I had.”

Let’s shake hands to make this world a better place to live.
